T02D2619:92a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2619:92a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2619:92a-4: nyes pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i 'phags pa
T02D2619:92a-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2619:92a-6: // gang phyir dpal dang de nyid kyi phyir byang chub dang //
T02D2619:92a-7: grol dang gang phyir don rtogs bsam pa ji lta bar //
T02D2619:92a-8: skye bo kun la rtag tu skyed par byed pa yi //
T02D2619:92a-9: dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs gang yin de la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2619:92a-10: thams cad mkhyen pas bstod pa dang //
T02D2619:92a-11: rgyal sras rnams kyis bkur ba dang //
T02D2619:92a-12: lha rnams 'dod pa gang yin la //
T02D2619:92a-13: rtag par kun du [*kun tu?] bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2619:92a-14: mthong na sdig pa zhi bar byed pa dang //
T02D2619:92a-15: reg na bde bskyed byed skyon med dang //
T02D2619:92a-16: ba sten la srid pa'i 'khrul spong dge ba yin //
T02D2619:92a-17: bshes gnyen zhabs la lus ngag yid kyis 'dud //
T02D2619:92a-18: zab ba'i snying po yon tan rin chen gter gyi mdzod //
T02D2619:92a-19: gang zhig bla ma mchog gis yun ring rgyas btab bzhag pa yi //
T02D2619:92a-20: mtshungs med sgrub thabs de 'dir bdag gis dbye bar bya //
T02D2619:92a-21: brtson 'grus mtha' med ston pa'i rgya mtsho yi //
T02D2619:92a-22: grangs med pa yi grangs las 'das pa yi //
T02D2619:92b-0: bskal bar bsgrubs @92b nas rgyal bas pha rol du //
T02D2619:92b-1: phyin nas de 'dir rab tu bshad pa'ang yin //
T02D2619:92b-2: dngos grub bkra shis kun gyi khang chen 'di //
T02D2619:92b-3: 'jam dbyangs sgrub thabs 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi nor //
T02D2619:92b-4: gzugs med chos kying gzugs dang ldan pa nyid ston pa //
T02D2619:92b-5: gang de 'khrul pa kun gyi sman chen gcig pu yin //
T02D2619:92b-6: 'di yis bskyed pa'i rin chen ni //
T02D2619:92b-7: tshogs gnyis gzi brjid ldan pa yi //
T02D2619:92b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mig gis ni //
T02D2619:92b-9: bltas pa'i skye med chos nyid do //
T02D2619:92b-10: byang chub sems dpa' yun ring du //
T02D2619:92b-11: goms pa yid la 'dod pa yi //
T02D2619:92b-12: yal ga thabs shes bya ba 'di //
T02D2619:92b-13: 'bras bu bde ba ster ba yin //
T02D2619:92b-14: thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni //
T02D2619:92b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis gang gsungs pa //
T02D2619:92b-16: bla ma ba sten pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2619:92b-17: de 'dir dngos su myong ba yin //
T02D2619:92b-18: 'khrul pa yang dag spangs pas na //
T02D2619:92b-21: bdud rtsi'i ro mchog myong bar byed //
T02D2619:92b-23: 'di dag rnam par dpyad pa na //
T02D2619:92b-24: 'di yi snying po cung zad kyang //
T02D2619:92b-25: bde bar gshegs pas ma gzigs so //
T02D2619:92b-26: snying po las kyang snying po che //
T02D2619:92b-27: shin tu phul du byung ba ste //
T02D2619:92b-29: bde ba ster bar bshad pa'ang yin //
T02D2619:92b-30: de 'dir las dang po dag ni //
T02D2619:92b-31: ji ltar yang ni nyams gyur kyang //
T02D2619:92b-32: de las ngan song med bde ba //
T02D2619:92b-33: khams gsum rgyal po gtso bor gyur //
T02D2619:92b-34: rnam kun shin tu zab pa dang //
T02D2619:92b-35: rnam kun rnam par dag pa ster //
T02D2619:92b-36: rnam kun bdud rtsi 'dzag pa dang //
T02D2619:92b-37: rnam pa kun gyi don chen byed //
T02D2619:92b-38: rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang //
T02D2619:92b-39: rnam pa kun gyi bla med pa'i //
T02D2619:92b-40: rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni //
T02D2619:92b-41: lhan skyes shin tu 'od gsal ba //
T02D2619:92b-43: da ni yang dag gsal bar bya //
T02D2619:92b-44: bshes gnyen dam pa ba sten pa las //
T02D2619:92b-45: rjes ngang thob par rang nyid ni //
T02D2619:92b-46: shes rab bdud rtsi'i rgyun dag gis //
T02D2619:92b-47: yid kyi dri ma 'khrud pa yin //
T02D2619:92b-48: chos rnams thams cad stong pa'i phyir //
T02D2619:92b-49: bdag 'dzin shes rab ldan na yang //
T02D2619:93a-1: las lhag pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D2619:93a-2: mthong ba'i sgrub pa po dag yin //
T02D2619:93a-3: rang gi dam bcas rjes zhugs pa //
T02D2619:93a-4: dri med dad pa rgyan yid kyis //
T02D2619:93a-5: dga' bas phun tshogs dang por ni //
T02D2619:93a-6: mtshan ma'i skyil krung bcas nas su //
T02D2619:93a-7: sna yi rtse mo drang po la //
T02D2619:93a-8: mig gtang nas ni yid brtan bya //
T02D2619:93a-9: lus drang ba dang dran pa dang //
T02D2619:93a-10: shes rab bsam gtan phyag rgyar ldan //
T02D2619:93a-11: dang por stong pa'i zla tshes bcas //
T02D2619:93a-12: rang gi mtshan gyi yi ge gnas //
T02D2619:93a-13: snying gar pam skyes padma dang //
T02D2619:93a-14: gzugs brnyan de dbus rnam par lta //
T02D2619:93a-15: ye shes dag pa'i nam mkha' la //
T02D2619:93a-16: sangs rgyas kyis gang bltas nas ni //
T02D2619:93a-17: de mthong mngon gsal dad pa yis //
T02D2619:93a-18: snying po padma rgyas gnas las //
T02D2619:93a-19: yid tshim pa yi lus kyi ni //
T02D2619:93a-20: dpal las yang dag byung ba yi //
T02D2619:93a-21: 'jam dpal bdag nyid chen po yi //
T02D2619:93a-22: gus pas glu ni len pa yi //
T02D2619:93a-23: sna tshogs lha mo rnam sprul zhing ;
T02D2619:93a-24: / mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam spros la //
T02D2619:93a-25: sangs rgyas sras dang bla ma rnams //
T02D2619:93a-26: de yis ma lus mchod byas nas //
T02D2619:93a-27: bdag gzhan sdig pa thams cad ni //
T02D2619:93a-28: bshags pa'i me yis bsreg par bya //
T02D2619:93a-29: rjes yi rang bas de nyid shes //
T02D2619:93a-30: bsod nams thams cad bdag gis 'gyur ;
T02D2619:93a-31: / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song bas //
T02D2619:93a-33: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las //
T02D2619:93a-34: rin chen sems 'dra sems can la'o //
T02D2619:93a-35: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid lam gnas pas //
T02D2619:93a-36: rang dgar spyod dang thar pa yin //
T02D2619:93a-37: smon lam dag ni yang nas yang //
T02D2619:93a-38: ston pas de dngos len par bya //
T02D2619:93a-39: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yis ni //
T02D2619:93a-40: stong nyid rgyu dang bral ba las //
T02D2619:93a-41: mtshan ma med pa de nas ni //
T02D2619:93a-42: gsal bar smon pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2619:93a-43: de ltar bsgom pas brten pa ni //
T02D2619:93a-44: de nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa yin //
T02D2619:93a-45: rang bzhin gnyis med ye shes kyi //
T02D2619:93a-46: rang bzhin rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2619:93a-47: sngags kyis 'di ltar brtan par bya //
T02D2619:93a-48: bsod nams rgya mtsho 'phel ba yis //
T02D2619:93a-49: sangs rgyas kun gyis legs bltas pas //
T02D2619:93a-51: aom ma h'a sarba p'a pam k'a ye kam b'a
T02D2619:93b-0: ka tse ka ma na @93b saddh'u tam ra ga
T02D2619:93b-1: dhi sha m'u ha da ma da ma na aa
T02D2619:93b-3: tattri ka le kam h'um h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat phat /
T02D2619:93b-4: sarba p'a pam spho ta ya me sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:93b-5: aom sarba p'a pam pra hi dhi na ye me sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:93b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta n'a m'atma bha ba ni rya t'a y'a mi //
T02D2619:93b-7: sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ti gri hnam sva mi mam sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:93b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pun+ya dzny'a na sam bha ra aa nu mu da ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:93b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta bha dra
T02D2619:93b-10: ma h'a badzra sa ma yam ma h'a bo dhi
T02D2619:93b-11: tsi tto ta p'a dam au tp'a da y'a me
T02D2619:93b-12: sv'a h'a / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sha na sa tya sam sarba sa tv'a n'am /
T02D2619:93b-13: sarba siddhya sam sa dyan ti sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa aa de sha na ti /
T02D2619:93b-14: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a ba shuddho ham /
T02D2619:93b-15: aom sh'un+ya t'a dznya na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2619:93b-16: aom 'jig rten 'das pa'i bde myang dang //
T02D2619:93b-17: sdug bsngal rtsa ba mi mnyam med //
T02D2619:93b-18: dga' ba 'o ma rgya mtsho'i rlabs //
T02D2619:93b-19: thams cad btang snyoms 'od gsal ba'i //
T02D2619:93b-20: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pas //
T02D2619:93b-21: bya ba byas ba bla med de //
T02D2619:93b-22: de nas mthong ba'i lam byon pa'i //
T02D2619:93b-23: sangs rgyas de yi rjes bzung ba //
T02D2619:93b-24: bu yis byang chub 'thob par ni //
T02D2619:93b-25: gyis la sogs pa gdams ngag yin //
T02D2619:93b-26: dad pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni //
T02D2619:93b-27: phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa'ang bya //
T02D2619:93b-28: mgon po gang gi lam zhugs pa //
T02D2619:93b-29: bdag la rjes su ngang bar mdzad //
T02D2619:93b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta /
T02D2619:93b-31: pra na me na badzra banda nam ka ro mi /
T02D2619:93b-33: rang bzhin grub pa'i sngags 'di ni //
T02D2619:93b-34: ci dgar bzlas pa lta bar gyis //
T02D2619:93b-35: phung po khams dang skye mched sogs //
T02D2619:93b-36: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D2619:93b-37: rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi //
T02D2619:93b-38: rang sems zhes ni nges gsungs so //
T02D2619:93b-39: phyag rgya dang po'i sems dag la //
T02D2619:93b-40: so sor rtog pa byed bdag yin //
T02D2619:93b-42: de mthong zhes ni gsol ba dang //
T02D2619:93b-43: bla ma de yis slar gsungs pa ;
T02D2619:93b-44: / zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par ltos //
T02D2619:93b-45: de 'dir snying rje'i sems kyis ni //
T02D2619:93b-46: dmigs pa med par byas nas ni //
T02D2619:93b-47: dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi //
T02D2619:93b-48: mun sel shin tu 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2619:93b-49: rang gis nyams myong dga' mthong nas //
T02D2619:94a-0: rang gzhan don ni gsal ba @94a * //
T02D2619:94a-2: / khyod kyi mthu yis mthong ngo zhes //
T02D2619:94a-3: de yis slar yang gsol ba dang //
T02D2619:94a-4: de yis brtan par gyis gsungs nas //
T02D2619:94a-5: rjes su brtan pa pha rol 'gro //
T02D2619:94a-6: aom dzny'a na rashme bi sre dza h'um /
T02D2619:94a-7: rnam pa lnga yi 'od zer ni //
T02D2619:94a-8: phyogs rnams kun du [*kun tu?] spro ba yis //
T02D2619:94a-9: 'dod chags sems can kun gyi ni //
T02D2619:94a-10: mi bzad sdug bsngal bsregs nas ni //
T02D2619:94a-11: rnal 'byor pa yis de dag kun //
T02D2619:94a-12: sangs rgyas nyid bkod gcig gyur las //
T02D2619:94a-13: de yis rdo rje rtogs pa yin //
T02D2619:94a-16: aom sam h'a ra na badzra /
T02D2619:94a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na badzra /
T02D2619:94a-19: rdo rje dbyings zhes yang dang yang //
T02D2619:94a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje yis //
T02D2619:94a-21: rang bzhin bdag nyid dbang bskur ro //
T02D2619:94a-23: zhes ni yang dag par ni brjod par bya //
T02D2619:94a-25: gyur phyir byin gyis brlab tu gsol ;
T02D2619:94a-26: / zhes ni gsol gdab skad cig la //
T02D2619:94a-27: de dag rab tu zhugs nas ni //
T02D2619:94a-28: de yi bdag nyid rang nyid gyur //
T02D2619:94a-29: aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /
T02D2619:94a-30: rdo rje rin chen sogs mnyam nyid //
T02D2619:94a-31: rnam pa kun du [*kun tu?] 'od gsal ba //
T02D2619:94a-32: chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba'i //
T02D2619:94a-33: dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bstod do //
T02D2619:94a-34: de las sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid //
T02D2619:94a-35: 'gro ba sad pa'i brtul zhugs yin //
T02D2619:94a-36: dang por snod kyi 'jig rten ni //
T02D2619:94a-37: rnam par dag par bya ba ni //
T02D2619:94a-38: gang la mngon par byang chub ba //
T02D2619:94a-39: 'di rnams gus pa'i gnas min te //
T02D2619:94a-40: de ni gzhan don bla med pa //
T02D2619:94a-41: rgyal ba gcig pu ngo mtshar che //
T02D2619:94a-42: 'bar ba'i h'um gi rnam pa yis //
T02D2619:94a-43: bdud kyi cho 'phrul sreg par byed //
T02D2619:94a-44: 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa ru //
T02D2619:94a-45: bltas nas phyogs rnams kun du [*kun tu?] ni //
T02D2619:94a-46: de yi rdo rjer ba bsam //
T02D2619:94a-47: yi ge h'um gi dbus gnas la //
T02D2619:94a-49: sa bon gsum las byung ba yi //
T02D2619:94a-50: rlung dang chu me'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D2619:94a-51: de nyid rigs pas blta bar bya //
T02D2619:94a-52: mkha' la bhr'um yig las byung ba'i //
T02D2619:94a-53: rtag pa'i yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02D2619:94a-54: bdud rtsi sprin rgyun yongs gang bas //
T02D2619:94a-55: snod ni de yi bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02D2619:94b-0: h'um gnyis @94b dbus su bhr'um yig las //
T02D2619:94b-1: sku yi rdo rje yang dag byung //
T02D2619:94b-2: gnas pa mkhrang bar gyur pa las //
T02D2619:94b-4: h'um gi yi ge de gnyis la //
T02D2619:94b-5: sum las byung ba'i lhun po ste //
T02D2619:94b-6: de ru bhr'um yig las byung ba'i //
T02D2619:94b-7: dpal ldan gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsam ;
T02D2619:94b-8: / bla re dra ba dpyangs pa dang //
T02D2619:94b-9: rin chen ka ba 'od zer dang //
T02D2619:94b-10: rta babs khyams dang ldan pa yin //
T02D2619:94b-11: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
T02D2619:94b-12: gdung ba chen po zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D2619:94b-13: zla ba dkar ltar mdzes pa yi //
T02D2619:94b-14: me tog phreng ba dpyangs pa'i tshogs //
T02D2619:94b-15: phyogs rnams kun du [*kun tu?] gzhag pa yin //
T02D2619:94b-16: dam chos zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2619:94b-17: seng ge'i khan rin po che'i //
T02D2619:94b-18: phreng ba'i sprin ni nges 'byung bas //
T02D2619:94b-19: brgya byin mtshon cha rnams brtsegs pa'i //
T02D2619:94b-20: tshon rtsi rnam lnga sar pa yis //
T02D2619:94b-21: phyogs bcur 'khor bar bskor ba yin //
T02D2619:94b-22: mdzes pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i //
T02D2619:94b-23: g-yer kha dag las yang dag par //
T02D2619:94b-24: dam pa chos kyi sgra dag ni //
T02D2619:94b-25: khyad par du ni sgrogs pa yin //
T02D2619:94b-26: stegs bu gar gyi lha mo mchog //
T02D2619:94b-27: tshogs nas glu ni yang dag len //
T02D2619:94b-28: dang ldan lha mo'i mchog rnams ni //
T02D2619:94b-29: phyi rol gnas la rnam gnas nas //
T02D2619:94b-31: lha yi me tog phreng 'dzin pa'i //
T02D2619:94b-32: mdzes pa'i mchod pa rgyas par byed //
T02D2619:94b-33: gang yang phyogs kun spros pa las //
T02D2619:94b-34: shin tu mi bzad 'khyud pa yis //
T02D2619:94b-35: dar dbyangs sor mo 'khor ba yin //
T02D2619:94b-36: nyi ma'i mdog ltar snang ba yi ;
T02D2619:94b-37: / dpag med rgyal mtshan sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2619:94b-38: gar byed mchog gi phyag bzhin no //
T02D2619:94b-39: kun du [*kun tu?] 'gro ba'i kun bdag nyid //
T02D2619:94b-40: thub pa chen po rnams kyi ni //
T02D2619:94b-41: gang du mdzad pa thams cad dag / grangs med mtshungs pa med pa ni //
T02D2619:94b-42: rnam dbye rin chen snang ba yi //
T02D2619:94b-43: de ni chos dbyings dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2619:94b-45: dbus su nyi ma gnas par lta //
T02D2619:94b-46: gang gi ge sar rdul gyi phyogs //
T02D2619:94b-47: btso ma gser gyi mdog bzhin mdzes //
T02D2619:94b-48: phyogs brgyang dag gi 'dab ma la //
T02D2619:94b-49: aa yig gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa //
T02D2619:95a-2: bdud kyi glang po 'bros par byed //
T02D2619:95a-3: de yi lte bar ri rab las //
T02D2619:95a-4: nyi ma'i dbus su mam 'od kyis //
T02D2619:95a-5: sems can byang chub la bkod nas //
T02D2619:95a-6: de bzhin gshegs kun bsdu bar bya //
T02D2619:95a-7: de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gcod //
T02D2619:95a-9: stong nyid shes rtse rdo rje dang //
T02D2619:95a-10: ral gri'i chu la 'khor lo snang //
T02D2619:95a-11: de las spros pa'i 'jam pa'i dpal //
T02D2619:95a-12: zla rgyas 'od kyis rig pa bsdu //
T02D2619:95a-13: gzhon nu 'os pa bla med pa //
T02D2619:95a-14: gang 'di dpal rnams spro bas ba sten //
T02D2619:95a-15: mgul rgyan dang ni dpung rgyan dang ;
T02D2619:95a-16: / rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub sogs //
T02D2619:95a-17: rgyan de rnams kyis rab tu brgyan //
T02D2619:95a-18: de ni byang chub snying po yin //
T02D2619:95a-19: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2619:95a-21: yon tan rgya chen rgyun rgyas pa'i //
T02D2619:95a-22: gzhon nu'i sku mdzes legs pa'i dpal //
T02D2619:95a-23: mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa yi //
T02D2619:95a-24: de ltar rab tu snang ba yin //
T02D2619:95a-25: ji ltar rang bzhin dag pa yi //
T02D2619:95a-26: yid kyi rgya mtsho'i gnas de ru //
T02D2619:95a-27: spyin pa la sogs rin chen tshogs //
T02D2619:95a-28: thugs rje'i yon tan chu bzhin no //
T02D2619:95a-29: rdo rje'i skyil krung zhabs gnyis kyis //
T02D2619:95a-30: pad gsal 'khor lo'i mtshan ma las //
T02D2619:95a-33: rin chen mdzes pa'i ska rags la //
T02D2619:95a-34: lte ba zab pa 'phro ba dang //

T02D2619:98b-8: / gnas dang gnas min rnam smin dang //
T02D2619:98b-9: mos pa dang ni sna tshogs khams //
T02D2619:98b-10: dbang po kun 'gro lam dag dang //
T02D2619:98b-11: nyon mongs rnam par byang ba dang //
T02D2619:98b-12: sngon gnas rjes dran skye 'chi dang //
T02D2619:98b-13: zag pa zad pa nyid kyang ste //
T02D2619:98b-14: rdo rje smra bzang kyi mdog / phyag gis lce bsnams 'khor gyis bskor //
T02D2619:98b-15: nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang //
T02D2619:98b-16: de las gzhan pa zil gnon brgyang //
T02D2619:98b-17: rdo rje las ni sku mdog ljang //
T02D2619:98b-18: sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02D2619:98b-19: 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi dag dang //
T02D2619:98b-20: sngon po ser po dkar dmar dang //
T02D2619:98b-21: nam mkha' de bzhin sems dang ni //
T02D2619:98b-22: zad par rnam par dag ldan pa'i //
T02D2619:98b-23: bsrung ba ser po go cha bsnams //
T02D2619:98b-24: rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid de kho na //
T02D2619:98b-25: phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2619:98b-26: 'bras bu rgyu yi de kho na //
T02D2619:98b-27: phra ba dang ni rags pa dang //
T02D2619:98b-28: grags pa rnam par dag yul dang //
T02D2619:98b-29: bsdu dang dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2619:98b-30: mkhas de kho na rnam bcu ni //
T02D2619:98b-31: rdo rje gnod spyin sku mdog gnag / phyag gnyis mche bsnams pa'o //
T02D2619:98b-32: tshe dang sems dang yo byad dang //
T02D2619:98b-33: las dang skye ba mos pa dang //
T02D2619:98b-34: smon lam dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang //
T02D2619:98b-35: ye shes chos la dbang 'di rnams //
T02D2619:98b-36: rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar //
T02D2619:98b-37: phyag gnyis khu tshur bsnams pa'o //
T02D2619:98b-38: so so'i gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskyed //
T02D2619:98b-39: rang rang sngags kyi mchod pa dang //
T02D2619:98b-40: rdo rje skyil krung phyed kyis ni //
T02D2619:98b-41: 'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin //
T02D2619:98b-43: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni //
T02D2619:98b-44: 'di skad gsungs pa bzhin du thob //
T02D2619:98b-45: dngos grub gzhan ni smos ci dgos //
T02D2619:98b-46: me mtshams sgeg mo sku mdog dkar //
T02D2619:98b-47: phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams nas ni //
T02D2619:98b-48: sgeg dang bcas pas dkur brten nas //
T02D2619:99a-2: bden bral rdo rje phreng ba ma //
T02D2619:99a-3: mdog ser rin chen phreng ba bsnams //
T02D2619:99a-4: rlung du glu ma sku mdog dmar //
T02D2619:99a-5: pi wang brdung ba'i mchog yin no //
T02D2619:99a-6: dbang ldan gar ma rdo rje ni //
T02D2619:99a-7: rtse gcig bsnams nas gar mdzad do //
T02D2619:99a-8: bdug pa me tog mar me dri //
T02D2619:99a-9: spos khang me tog phreng ba dang //
T02D2619:99a-10: mar me dri yi dung chos bsnams //
T02D2619:99a-11: sku mdog sgeg mo la sogs bzhin //
T02D2619:99a-12: de yi phyi rol dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2619:99a-13: sems can kun don byed bdag nyid //
T02D2619:99a-14: dpag med gzi brjid rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02D2619:99a-15: gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2619:99a-16: sku lus mdzes shing nyer zhi ba //
T02D2619:99a-17: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa //
T02D2619:99a-18: padma zla ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D2619:99a-19: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs //
T02D2619:99a-20: mgon po byams pa la sogs pa //
T02D2619:99a-21: rin chen cod pan snang bar bsgom //
T02D2619:99a-22: de la byams pa phyag g-yas kyis //
T02D2619:99a-23: mchod spyin dpung rgyan mdzes pa dang //
T02D2619:99a-24: gnyis pa phyag gnyis klu shing ni //
T02D2619:99a-25: mdzes pa yang dag bsnams pa yin //
T02D2619:99a-26: 'jam dbyangs phyag na ral gri ni //
T02D2619:99a-27: rin po che yis mdzes pa bsnams //
T02D2619:99a-28: chos kyi spyin pa rjes byed pa'i //
T02D2619:99a-29: gzhan gyis shes rab pu sti bsnams //
T02D2619:99a-30: spos kyi glang po gsal byed pa //
T02D2619:99a-31: dri yi dung chos bsnams pa dang //
T02D2619:99a-32: g-yas pa'i phyag gis mchod spyin dang //
T02D2619:99a-33: spyi bor 'od dpag med rol ldan //
T02D2619:99a-34: ye shes tog ces bya ba ni //
T02D2619:99a-35: thod kyis mtshan pa'i cod phan bsnams /
T02D2619:99a-36: zla rgyas rnam par mdzes pa yi //
T02D2619:99a-37: bzhi po dri ma med pa 'di //
T02D2619:99a-38: gti mug mun pa lta bu ni //
T02D2619:99a-39: 'joms par byed pa shar gyi yin //
T02D2619:99a-40: dpal ldan bzang skyong zhes bya ba //
T02D2619:99a-42: rin chen 'bar ba lho phyogs su //
T02D2619:99a-43: nor bu rgyal mtshan phyag na bsnams //
T02D2619:99a-44: phyag g-yon de bzhin nam mkha' yi //

T02D2619:99a-46: blo gros rgya mtsho gser gyi mdog / phyag gnyis bskal ba bzang po yi //
T02D2619:99a-47: dpag bsam shing dang bum pa bzang //
T02D2619:99a-48: sems can don mchog 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2619:99b-0: blo gros @99b mi zad phyag g-yon gyis //
T02D2619:99b-1: pu stis mtshan pa'i ral gri bsnams //
T02D2619:99b-2: spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin du //
T02D2619:99b-3: phyag na ral gris mtshan pa yin //
T02D2619:99b-4: gshin rje'i phyogs su bzhugs pa rnams //
T02D2619:99b-5: sku mdog ser po 'od zer ldan //
T02D2619:99b-6: byang chub phun tshogs mi zad pa'i //
T02D2619:99b-7: 'di dag sems can rnams la brten //
T02D2619:99b-8: mthu chen thob pa ral gri dang //
T02D2619:99b-9: rgyal mtshan dag gis legs par brgyan //
T02D2619:99b-10: ngan song kun 'dren zhes bya ba //
T02D2619:99b-11: dpal be'u 'dzin cing byams par byed //
T02D2619:99b-12: mya ngan kun 'joms blo gros ni //
T02D2619:99b-13: phyag na g-yung drung 'khyil ba bsnams //
T02D2619:99b-14: zla bas mtshan pa'i dril bu dang //
T02D2619:99b-15: dril bu'i sgra yi rnam pa yis //
T02D2619:99b-16: mtshan pa'i gdugs ni 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2619:99b-17: dman pa dga' ba phun tshogs pa'i //
T02D2619:99b-18: skyed pa'i lus kyi dra ba can //
T02D2619:99b-20: nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2619:99b-21: zla 'od gzhon nu gsal ba yin //
T02D2619:99b-22: pu stis mtshan pa'i ral gri bsnams //
T02D2619:99b-23: skal ldan rin chen mdzod chen po //

T02D2619:99b-25: nam mkha'i snying po phyag g-yas kyis //
T02D2619:99b-26: rin po che ni bteg nas bsnams //
T02D2619:99b-27: sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba ;
T02D2619:99b-28: / phyag g-yas ral gri bsnams pa dang //
T02D2619:99b-29: sna tshogs rdo rje g-yon na bsnams //
T02D2619:99b-30: mya ngan thams cad sel ba yin //
T02D2619:99b-31: byang gi phyogs su bzhugs pa rnams //
T02D2619:99b-32: thams cad sku mdog ljang gu yin //
T02D2619:99b-33: yang na thams cad rim bzhin du //
T02D2619:99b-34: g-yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang ;
T02D2619:99b-35: / rin po che dang chu skyes dang //
T02D2619:99b-36: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa dang //
T02D2619:99b-37: ji ltar rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D2619:99b-38: phyag g-yon dril bu bsnams pa yin //
T02D2619:99b-39: 'di rnams rim bzhin sngags kyis ni //
T02D2619:99b-40: nyon mongs ma lus sel ba yin //
T02D2619:99b-41: aom me tree ya sam h'a ra na ya sv'a h'a /

T02D2619:99b-43: aom hr'ai:ganbha ha ti ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:99b-44: aom dzany'a na ke du ye sv'a h'a /

T02D2619:99b-50: aom a'a ka ra ya sv'a h'a /

T02D2619:100a-4: aom aa mri t'a bh'a to h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:100a-5: aom kha a'a ka sha ga rbha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:100a-6: aom sarba ni wa ra ni ji shkam pi ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:100a-7: rdo rje h'um mdzad dbang ldan du //
T02D2619:100a-8: sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa //
T02D2619:100a-9: dang po khro zhing sgeg pa dang //
T02D2619:100a-10: g-yas pa drag po 'jigs rung dang //
T02D2619:100a-11: de las gzhan pa dpa' bo dang //
T02D2619:100a-12: steng gi zhal ni rngam pa yin //
T02D2619:100a-13: snying gar khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi //
T02D2619:100a-14: phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag gnyis ni //
T02D2619:100a-15: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa //
T02D2619:100a-16: rgyab du spyar nas mthe'u chung gnyis //
T02D2619:100a-17: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings nas //
T02D2619:100a-18: mdzub mo gnyis ni legs par spyang //
T02D2619:100a-19: g-yas na ral gri lcags kyu mda' //
T02D2619:100a-20: gzhu dang sprul zhags rdo rje g-yon //
T02D2619:100a-21: de yi zhabs kyi bkod pa yis //
T02D2619:100a-22: dregs pa dbang phyug chen po dang //

T02D2619:100a-24: zhabs kyis gnon pa bzhugs pa yin //
T02D2619:100a-25: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ni //
T02D2619:100a-26: mi'u thung dud pa'i mdog can no //
T02D2619:100a-27: g-yas na rdo rje ral gri dang //
T02D2619:100a-28: de bzhin du ni 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D2619:100a-29: g-yon na dril bu zhags pa gzhu //
T02D2619:100a-30: ba dan sna tshogs g-yon pas brgyan //

T02D2619:100a-32: sgra yis phyogs kun khyab pa dang //
T02D2619:100a-33: khyab 'jug chung mar bcas pa la //
T02D2619:100a-34: g-yas brkyang pa yi dga' bas ba zhugs //
T02D2619:100a-35: 'khrul pa rnam par dag ngo bo //
T02D2619:100a-36: de ni spangs pa'i mchog yin no //
T02D2619:100a-37: de bzhin bden bral mtshams su ni //
T02D2619:100a-38: dpal ldan dpa' bo khrag 'thung rgyal //
T02D2619:100a-39: dang po'i zhal ni drag po dang //
T02D2619:100a-40: g-yas zhal dga' ba'i rgyal ba dang //

T02D2619:100a-42: g-yon pa mchog tu sgeg par gnas //
T02D2619:100a-43: 'bar ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs kha t'a sgeg pa dang //
T02D2619:100a-44: 'jigs byed lpags dmar rlon pa rim par ni //
T02D2619:100a-45: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag gis mda' dang gzhu //
T02D2619:100a-46: phyag gnyis kyis ni khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa bsnams //
T02D2619:100a-47: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa mnan //
T02D2619:100a-48: 'gro ba'i byed po keng rus rgyan dang ska rags dang //
T02D2619:100b-0: @100b sangs rgyas mtshan ma nang gnas pa'i //
T02D2619:100b-1: thod pa lnga yi cod pan gsal //
T02D2619:100b-2: bgegs tshogs ma lus rengs byed pa'i //
T02D2619:100b-3: sprin nag po yi sku 'chang ba //
T02D2619:100b-4: rnam par dag byed mgo bo yi //
T02D2619:100b-5: phreng ba rus pa'i dum bu yi //
T02D2619:100b-6: sprul nag po yi ngo bos ni //
T02D2619:100b-7: 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba yin //
T02D2619:100b-8: 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba'i mi bzad sgeg pa'i spyod pa dang //
T02D2619:100b-9: chags dang bral pa spangs pas sgyu ma'i phreng ba 'chang ba yin //
T02D2619:100b-10: mang po ji ltar gcig yin gcig tu rtogs nas gzhan pa yin //
T02D2619:100b-11: de yang skye ba de nyid dngos kun bdag po nyid kho na //
T02D2619:100b-12: rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa mya ngan 'das mchog yin //
T02D2619:100b-13: 'od zer 'bar ba dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes phyag rgya yin //
T02D2619:100b-14: rlung gi phyogs kyi rta mchog ni //
T02D2619:100b-15: de ni zhabs bzhir yang dag ldan //
T02D2619:100b-16: spyan gsum khro bo sgeg pa yi //
T02D2619:100b-17: gtso bo'i zhal gsum g-yas pa ni //
T02D2619:100b-18: drag po g-yon pa tshangs pa dang //
T02D2619:100b-19: rta gdong steng ma ljang gu'o //
T02D2619:100b-20: ba dan gsum ldan g-yas pa ni //
T02D2619:100b-21: steng du slong bar byed pa'i tshul //
T02D2619:100b-22: ral gri dma' ni 'dzin pa gzhan //
T02D2619:100b-23: thod pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang //
T02D2619:100b-24: mdung thung dang ni dbyug pa dang //
T02D2619:100b-25: bzhi ni g-yon pa'i phyag bzhi la'o //
T02D2619:100b-26: g-yas kyi gtso bo'i zhabs kyis ni //
T02D2619:100b-27: dpal mo dbang mo gzhan gyis ni //
T02D2619:100b-28: chags ma dga' ma mnan pa yin //

T02D2619:100b-30: g-yon gyi dbang po myos byed dang //

T02D2619:100b-32: rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang //
T02D2619:100b-34: bdud rnams snying ni 'gas pa dang //

T02D2619:100b-47: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um phat /

T02D2619:101a-0: @101a * // gang gi sems kyis spro ba 'jug pa yin //
T02D2619:101a-1: lha yi dbang po mchod pa byed pa 'di //

T02D2619:101a-4: de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni //

T02D2619:101a-34: phyag gnyis phreng ba blugs gzar dang //

T02D2619:101b-14: mdog nag rus sbal la gnas pa //
T02D2619:101b-15: lag na dbyug pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2619:101b-16: sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma thogs //
T02D2619:101b-17: mjug rings ral gri zhags pa thogs //
T02D2619:101b-18: rgyu skar dkyil 'khor bud med gzugs //
T02D2619:101b-19: lha mo'i rnam par mdzes pa yin //
T02D2619:101b-20: spyi bor thal mo spyar ba ru //
T02D2619:101b-21: bsgom bya sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2619:101b-22: dkar po dang po bzhi pa dang //
T02D2619:101b-23: drug pa bdun pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2619:101b-24: dgu pa dang ni bcu pa dang //
T02D2619:101b-25: bcu gsum pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2619:101b-26: bco lnga pa dang bco brgyang pa //
T02D2619:101b-27: nyi shu gnyis pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2619:101b-28: nyi shu gcig dang nyi shu dgu //
T02D2619:101b-29: nyi shu brgyang pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2619:101b-30: sngo bsangs dag ni gsum pa dang //
T02D2619:101b-31: de bzhin lnga dang brgyang pa dang //
T02D2619:101b-32: bcu gcig pa dang bcu drug pa //
T02D2619:101b-33: de nas yang ni bcu bdun pa //
T02D2619:101b-34: nyi shu nyi shu gsum pa dang //
T02D2619:101b-35: nyi shu bzhi pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2619:101b-36: ljang gu dag ni gnyis pa dang //
T02D2619:101b-37: bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa ;
T02D2619:101b-38: / bcu gnyis bcu dgu nyi shu la //
T02D2619:101b-39: nyi shu drug pa'ang ser po ni //
T02D2619:101b-40: gzhon nu gser gyi mdog can la //
T02D2619:101b-41: gdong drug rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2619:101b-42: mdung thung rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02D2619:101b-43: khyim bya dag ni phyag na bsnams //
T02D2619:101b-44: glang sna dkar po lag bzhi pa //
T02D2619:101b-45: sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs 'chang zhing //
T02D2619:101b-46: la tu la phug tr'i sh'u la //
T02D2619:101b-47: de bzhin du ni gri gug thogs //
T02D2619:101b-48: byi ba la gnas nag po ni //
T02D2619:101b-49: dga' byed rdza rnga rdung bar byed //
T02D2619:101b-50: rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin pa ni //
T02D2619:101b-51: nag po ma h'a k'a lar grags //
T02D2619:101b-52: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa yi //
T02D2619:102a-2: tshangs ma dang ni go cha ma //
T02D2619:102a-3: drag po dbang ma gzhon nu ma //
T02D2619:102a-4: rang gi bdag po ji bzhin no //
T02D2619:102a-5: yi dvags la gnas phag mo ni //
T02D2619:102a-6: mdog nag po la thod pa 'chang //
T02D2619:102a-7: mdog dmar mche ba gtsigs pa yi //
T02D2619:102a-8: yi dvags gdan la gnas pa ni //
T02D2619:102a-9: chu gri dang ni thod pa dag / gtum mo yis ni 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2619:102a-10: mkha' lding rkang pa pus mo'i bar //
T02D2619:102a-11: dkar ser de nas lte ba'i bar //
T02D2619:102a-12: de nas mgrin pa nyi ma'i mdog / kha ni
T02D2619:102a-13: mig smin nag po'i mdog / stobs bzang glang po
T02D2619:102a-14: la gnas pa // ral gri gshol 'dzin dkar po yin //
T02D2619:102a-15: rgyal bar byed pa kha dog ljang //
T02D2619:102a-16: khu byug shing rta la gnas pa //
T02D2619:102a-17: me tog phreng dang mda' gzhu dang //
T02D2619:102a-18: kham phor lag na thogs pa yin //
T02D2619:102a-19: sbrang rtsir byed pa kha dog dkar //
T02D2619:102a-20: ne tso la gnas kham phor dang //
T02D2619:102a-21: mda' gzhu chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams //
T02D2619:102a-22: dpyid lha skal ldan mdzes pa ni //
T02D2619:102a-23: dre'u la gnas kha dog dkar //
T02D2619:102a-24: mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor dang //
T02D2619:102a-25: ral gri de ni 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2619:102a-26: sprul ni bdun bdun ldan pa'i klu //
T02D2619:102a-27: thal mo spyar ba byas nas 'dug / mtha' yas rigs ldan mdog dmar po //
T02D2619:102a-28: bram ze'i rigs de me las skyes //
T02D2619:102a-29: rgyal rigs dbang chen las skyes ser //
T02D2619:102a-30: dung skyong dang ni nor rgyas bu //
T02D2619:102a-32: nag po rje'u rigs rlung las skyes //
T02D2619:102a-33: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma ni //
T02D2619:102a-34: dmangs rigs dkar po chu las skyes //
T02D2619:102a-35: stobs bzangs dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D2619:102a-36: rab dga' dad ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2619:102a-37: khrab dang go cha ral gri dang //
T02D2619:102a-38: phub dang g-yul la 'jug pa yin //
T02D2619:102a-39: gser gyi mdog can bu dang bcas //
T02D2619:102a-40: gter ni spro ba'i phyogs byed pa'o //
T02D2619:102a-41: gnod spyin bdag po na ku la //
T02D2619:102a-42: grong dang grong khyer 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2619:102a-43: nor bu bzang po gser gyi mdog / gang ba bzang po sngon po yin //
T02D2619:102a-44: nor spyin kha dog dmar po yin //
T02D2619:102a-45: de bzhin rnam thos sras ser po //
T02D2619:102a-46: rtse gcig thun dang kha dog dmar //
T02D2619:102b-0: ki li mi la de bzhin gnag / sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang @102b po ni //
T02D2619:102b-1: ser po rgyud mangs brdung ljon pa //
T02D2619:102b-2: chung ma dang bcas dkar mo ni //
T02D2619:102b-3: gtsug phud lnga pa de bzhin no //
T02D2619:102b-4: bdag gi don kun grub pa dang //
T02D2619:102b-5: don med thams cad sel ba'o //
T02D2619:102b-6: rtsva bzhin rnyed bla'i thar pa ni //
T02D2619:102b-7: thams cad sangs rgyas ba stan las yin //
T02D2619:102b-9: ming tsam yang ni rnyed par dka' //
T02D2619:102b-10: chu bur snying po med pa yi //
T02D2619:102b-11: 'khor ba chos kyi rin chen ldan //
T02D2619:102b-15: de las mya ngan 'das mchog yin //
T02D2619:102b-16: de las snying po snying po mchog / bsgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2619:102b-17: bde gshegs kun gyis gang bsrungs pa'i //
T02D2619:102b-18: zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams 'thob //
T02D2619:102b-19: yon tan de las kyang 'byung ba //
T02D2619:102b-20: 'di ltar de la mchod pa rnams //
T02D2619:102b-21: mchod dang bzhugs gsol dga' ba dang //
T02D2619:102b-22: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas gzhan //
T02D2619:102b-23: mtshungs med mchod pa byed pa dag / des ni ting 'dzin thams cad 'grub //
T02D2619:102b-24: 'dir ni mchod dang mchod byed pa //
T02D2619:102b-25: lha mchog rnams kyis de mchog yin //
T02D2619:102b-26: dga' chen rgya mtsho rlabs kyis ni //
T02D2619:102b-27: 'jig rten bsil bar byed pa yin //
T02D2619:102b-28: mchod dang bsnyen bskur bcas pa dang //
T02D2619:102b-29: sna tshogs bkod pa'i khyad par ldan //
T02D2619:102b-30: de ni nam mkhar byad pa 'di //
T02D2619:102b-31: skad cig gis ni ngo mtshar rtogs //
T02D2619:102b-32: gzhan dang gzhan ni grangs med spros //
T02D2619:102b-33: nam mkha' shin tu rgya chen po //
T02D2619:102b-34: mchod pa'i sprin ni khyab pa yi //
T02D2619:102b-35: rin chen me tog sogs char gyis //
T02D2619:102b-36: dpag bsam shing rgyas skyed mos tshal //
T02D2619:102b-38: 'di ltar sngon med sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D2619:102b-39: yongs su bzung nas spro bar bya //
T02D2619:102b-40: dang bas snying ga'i pad rgyas pa'i //
T02D2619:102b-41: bde ba'i dpal ni 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2619:102b-42: sgeg pa'i ro yis bcus pa yis //
T02D2619:102b-43: rab tu spros pa rgyas pa yin //
T02D2619:102b-44: de dus yun ring gnas pa yi //
T02D2619:102b-45: drag po'i byang chub sems de ni //
T02D2619:102b-46: lus las ba spu ldang ba dang //
T02D2619:102b-47: rdo rje mchog ni skye ba yin //
T02D2619:103a-1: lha'i me tog rgyas tshogs kyis //
T02D2619:103a-2: gnas kun sprin gyi dra bas khyab //
T02D2619:103a-3: 'khor lo'i sems ni sna tshogs ro myong ba'i //
T02D2619:103a-4: g-yo dang mi g-yo 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ni //
T02D2619:103a-5: rnam pa sna tshogs 'byor pa'i gnas 'di ni //
T02D2619:103a-6: mchog gi mthu yis rgyas par spyod bzang po //
T02D2619:103a-7: pi wang rdza rnga rnga rings la sogs mnyam 'jug pa //
T02D2619:103a-8: gsang bar sgrogs pa chos kyi de ni mchog yin no //
T02D2619:103a-9: nyon mongs dri ngan rnam par spong byed gar 'byung ba'i //
T02D2619:103a-10: phyag rgya rgyun gyi sgeg pas lhan skyes rjes su byed //
T02D2619:103a-11: lha mo phyag gi madma rnam par 'jug pa yis ;
T02D2619:103a-12: / rdzing bu rlung gis bskyod pa'i padma mnyam par byed //
T02D2619:103a-13: dgod dang lta dang lag ba cangs dang ni gnyis gnyis 'khyud //
T02D2619:103a-14: mthong ba bdud rtsi dam pa bde ba gtso bo yin //
T02D2619:103a-15: gang zhig 'dir ni phyag rgya'i thabs ni chen po yi //
T02D2619:103a-16: 'bras bu thams cad ston pa yongs su spro ba yin //
T02D2619:103a-17: 'di ltar cho ga ngo mtshar chen po'i gnas sna tshogs //
T02D2619:103a-18: phun tshogs sgeg pa'i rgyas pa nyams myong 'byung //
T02D2619:103a-19: dkyil 'khor bdag po nas brtsams dkyil 'khor lha //
T02D2619:103a-20: 'khor lo grangs med rnam par 'byung ba yin //
T02D2619:103a-21: 'di ltar so sor bdud rtsi dpag med de 'di rgyas pa las //
T02D2619:103a-22: lhan skyes yon tan brgya 'gyur gnas pa yin //
T02D2619:103a-23: des na 'di ltar phan tshun lhag par spros pa yis //
T02D2619:103a-24: khyad 'phags kun gyis ma byas chos ro 'byung ba yin //
T02D2619:103a-25: 'di ltar sgrub pa dge ba rab 'byams bdag nyid ni //
T02D2619:103a-26: gang zhig rang bzhin rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2619:103a-27: des na de nyid bdud rtsi rgyas kun 'jug pa yin //
T02D2619:103a-28: lhan skyes mi g-yo'i rtogs pas mya ngan 'das //
T02D2619:103a-29: mchod pa'i so sor ting nge 'dzin thabs thob pa //
T02D2619:103a-30: thog ma med pa'i gter rnams sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags //
T02D2619:103a-31: rigs pa dang ni gzhan dag de bzhin nyid stong pa //
T02D2619:103a-32: shes rab byang chub chos dang bdag med ces //
T02D2619:103a-33: 'di 'dra'i phyi rol mchod pa chung gyur kyang //
T02D2619:103a-34: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchog 'gyur de nyid mthong ba nyid //
T02D2619:103a-35: 'di yi bsgrub pa sems can mchog ni rnyed par dka' ba yin //
T02D2619:103b-0: 'di ni bdud @103b rtsi'i rang bzhin las gzhan cis na 'gyur //
T02D2619:103b-1: gang dag thub pa'i sku gzugs ras ris glegs bam sogs //
T02D2619:103b-2: de nyid mngon par rlom zhing zhi bar 'dod pa nyid //
T02D2619:103b-3: de nyid phan du gnyis las yun ring nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2619:103b-4: dge ba'i las bral stong pa nyid la dgos pa med //
T02D2619:103b-5: mun nag thibs po zla ba'i 'od dang bral ba la //
T02D2619:103b-6: padma rgyas bral kha bas g-yogs pa'i mtsho bzhin no //
T02D2619:103b-7: rigs dang nor dang dka' thub sred pa dang //
T02D2619:103b-8: thub pa mchod bral de nyid shes pa yis //
T02D2619:103b-9: de ni lha rnams dga' bar byed min de su
T02D2619:103b-10: zhig / des na yon tan nyid thob min pa
T02D2619:103b-11: de gang zhig / gang du 'di ma gtogs par
T02D2619:103b-13: gang zhig mchod pa'ang de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2619:103b-14: chu bo bab pa rgya mtsho dang ba dang //
T02D2619:103b-15: sa la me tog rgyas pa 'byung ba dang //
T02D2619:103b-16: nyi ma shar bas don dam ba stan pa dang //
T02D2619:103b-17: mchod pa byed pa mchog de'i stobs kyis ni //
T02D2619:103b-18: ngan pas gzhan la gnod pa byas pa las //
T02D2619:103b-19: mi gtsang ba nyid cis ni 'byung mi 'gyur //
T02D2619:103b-20: de yi dag pa'i bdag nyid lag pa las //
T02D2619:103b-21: lha rnams me tog dag ni len pa yin //
T02D2619:103b-22: gang zhig sdig pa spangs pa dang //
T02D2619:103b-23: lam gsum la gnas ba stan pa ni ;
T02D2619:103b-26: 'di yi sgra las de las gzhan //
T02D2619:103b-28: 'di gtso nyid du mngon rlom pa //
T02D2619:103b-29: chos kyi lam las ltung ba yin //
T02D2619:103b-30: dam pa'i chos dang glegs bam dag / mdun du so sor byas nas ni //
T02D2619:103b-31: sngar bshad pa yi sngags kyis ni //
T02D2619:103b-32: phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02D2619:103b-33: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes yul //
T02D2619:103b-34: sngags kyi bsod nams phung po 'di //
T02D2619:103b-35: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba //
T02D2619:103b-36: sngon du 'don pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2619:103b-37: lce la h'um yig las byung ba'i //
T02D2619:103b-38: rdo rje dbus su hr'i: yig las //
T02D2619:103b-39: byung ba'i chu skyes dbus ram dzam //
T02D2619:103b-41: sngags pas snang ba mtha' yas bsgom //
T02D2619:103b-42: sngags bskul nas ni bzlas pa byas //
T02D2619:103b-43: de la sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D2619:104a-0: @104a * // aom padma sa ra sa ra satva satva pra barta ya shuddha ya /
T02D2619:104a-2: chos rnams kun la phyogs med par //
T02D2619:104a-3: sems can thams cad gyur cig ces //
T02D2619:104a-4: bsams nas de yi snying po bsal //
T02D2619:104a-5: 'di yi sngags dang dad ldan pa //
T02D2619:104a-7: sems can rnams kyi dri ma rnams //
T02D2619:104a-8: bsal lo zhes ni rnam bsams nas //
T02D2619:104a-9: 'di yis sngags pa yid gzhungs pas //
T02D2619:104a-10: dri ma thams cad bsal bar bya //
T02D2619:104a-11: aom sa manta pa r'i ksha gu hya tsa ri tsa ra h'um /
T02D2619:104a-14: chags pa med par byung ba'i phyir //
T02D2619:104a-15: sngags pas dag pa rnam bsam bya //
T02D2619:104a-16: aom ni rma ni shuddha h'um /
T02D2619:104a-17: rnam pa thams cad yongs gcod pa //
T02D2619:104a-18: chos dbyings rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D2619:104a-20: byed pa sngags pa mkhas pa yin ;
T02D2619:104a-22: rang bzhin stong par bsgom pa'i bdag / kun la chags pa med sems kyis //
T02D2619:104a-23: sngags kyi chu yi thig le yis //
T02D2619:104a-24: rang gi spyi bor dbang bskur bya //
T02D2619:104a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shi nytsa sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D2619:104a-26: chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis ;
T02D2619:104a-27: / gnas pa med par bsgom par bya //
T02D2619:104a-28: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
T02D2619:104a-29: sngags pas mchod pa brtsam par bya //
T02D2619:104a-30: aom aa mo gha padma ba su dha ri dha ra da re mandala h'um /
T02D2619:104a-31: las kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor bdag nyid //
T02D2619:104a-32: de nas dad pa'i mchod pa brtsam //
T02D2619:104a-33: bgegs mthar byed pa'am bgegs 'joms pa //
T02D2619:104a-34: bgegs rnams zhi bar bya phyir mchod //
T02D2619:104a-35: mchod pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyang //
T02D2619:104a-36: ji lta bzhin du sbyor rigs pas //
T02D2619:104a-37: g-yon pa la gnas dri gzugs dang //
T02D2619:104a-38: g-yas pa la gnas gzhan g-yon no //
T02D2619:104a-39: dang por dbul ba bya ba ni //
T02D2619:104a-40: aargha'i snod ni dag byed dang //
T02D2619:104a-41: padma'i phyag rgya ldan g-yon pas //
T02D2619:104a-42: de la pa dan gsum pa dag / de nyid shes pas yi ge ni //
T02D2619:104a-43: gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D2619:104a-44: aargha'i snod chu thogs pa yis //
T02D2619:104a-45: me tog la sogs bsangs nas ni //
T02D2619:104a-46: me tog la sogs lha mo yi //
T02D2619:104b-0: sngags @104b ni ji lta bzhin du brjod //
T02D2619:104b-1: de nyid mngon sum byas bdag nyid //
T02D2619:104b-2: sngags pa bla ma mchod par bya //
T02D2619:104b-3: brtul zhugs nyams pa la gzhan du //
T02D2619:104b-5: dbang po la sogs rnyed dka' ba //
T02D2619:104b-6: gang zhig byin gyi rlabs las thob //
T02D2619:104b-7: 'dir ni thal mo spyar byas nas //
T02D2619:104b-8: de yi sngags kyis spyan drangs ngo //
T02D2619:104b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra aanydza li sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2619:104b-10: zhes bya ba'i thal mo'i sngags so //
T02D2619:104b-11: phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2619:104b-12: sras bcas 'jig rten rab grags pa //
T02D2619:104b-13: rdo rje rin chen rigs dang ni //
T02D2619:104b-14: padma las kyi rigs de bzhin //
T02D2619:104b-15: snying po phyag rgya rim pa rnams //
T02D2619:104b-16: lha yi tshogs ni thams cad dag / de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2619:104b-17: chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa rnams //
T02D2619:104b-18: bdag ming che ge zhes bya ba //
T02D2619:104b-19: chos dbyings bdag nyid grong khyer ni //
T02D2619:104b-20: di ring dkyil 'khor mchod par gyis //
T02D2619:104b-21: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis mchod //
T02D2619:104b-22: sems can rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2619:104b-23: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2619:104b-24: rjes su brtse bas nyer dgongs la //
T02D2619:104b-25: byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad par rigs //
T02D2619:104b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhi sa tva pa ri shuddha sva bh'a ba a'atman /
T02D2619:104b-27: shuddhi aam shu p'u ra ya h'um /
T02D2619:104b-28: zhes bya ba 'di ni spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so //
T02D2619:104b-29: mchod cing bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2619:104b-30: de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya //
T02D2619:104b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pa stha
T02D2619:104b-33: n'a ya a'a tma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi
T02D2619:104b-34: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ti gri hnam tu m'am /
T02D2619:104b-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi ti shtham tu mam /
T02D2619:104b-36: aom aa mo gha san ti shtham tu h'um /
T02D2619:104b-37: zhes byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
T02D2619:104b-38: sngags kyi don ni 'di lta bu //

T02D2619:108a-23: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02D2619:108a-24: aom gri hna gri hna h'um /
T02D2619:108a-25: aom gri hna pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2619:108a-26: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bi dy'a r'a dza h'um /
T02D2619:108a-27: aom aak'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D2619:108a-28: a'a dy'a nu tpan'a tv'a ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2619:108a-29: phyi rol lha yi 'khor lo dang //
T02D2619:108a-30: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / rim gyis de ru gzhug par bya //
T02D2619:108a-31: de nas snying po'i 'khor lo dang //
T02D2619:108a-32: de yang gtsug tor dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2619:108a-33: de ni 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la //
T02D2619:108a-34: de yang phyag mtshan dang thig ler //
T02D2619:108a-35: de ltar snang ba sogs rim gyis //
T02D2619:108a-36: spros pa thams cad zhi ba dang //
T02D2619:108a-37: stong nyid la sogs rim thob pa'i //
T02D2619:108a-38: rnal 'byor lhan skyes mdzes pa yin //
T02D2619:108a-39: de ltar goms pas 'jug pa rnams //
T02D2619:108a-40: mi shes chu bo ma lus pa //
T02D2619:108a-41: bskams shing sems kyi zla ba ni //
T02D2619:108a-42: shar pa skal ba bzang po yin //
T02D2619:108a-44: thams cad spro ba'ang shes par bya //
T02D2619:108a-45: thig le'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis //
T02D2619:108b-0: yun mi ring bar grub @108b par 'gyur //
T02D2619:108b-1: yang na mdor bsdus sngags kyis ni //
T02D2619:108b-2: ji skad bshad pa'i me tog sogs //
T02D2619:108b-3: gang zhig cung zad dbul ba yis /
T02D2619:108b-4: me tog chung na'ang 'dir nyon mongs //
T02D2619:108b-5: dus mtha'i me ni 'joms pa yin //
T02D2619:108b-6: de la mdor bsdus pa'i sngags ni /
T02D2619:108b-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dza me
T02D2619:108b-8: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2619:108b-9: h'um / de bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa la yang ngo //
T02D2619:108b-11: yang na 'khor los sgyur ba ni //
T02D2619:108b-12: rgyu dang bcas pa'am snying po'am //
T02D2619:108b-13: 'khor lo'am phyi nang thams cad la //
T02D2619:108b-14: dad pa dag par ldan rnams dang //
T02D2619:108b-15: sems dpa' chen pos mchod par bya //
T02D2619:108b-16: mchod pa bshad par byas pa las //
T02D2619:108b-17: mtho ris thar pa'i snying po thob //
T02D2619:108b-18: de dang de las sgro 'dogs yongs 'khrul pa //
T02D2619:108b-19: sdug bsngal 'jigs pa'i ngo bo yi //
T02D2619:108b-20: lha yi 'khor lo chen po dga' ster ba ;
T02D2619:108b-21: / thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs spros pa yin //
T02D2619:108b-22: de ltar gcig mchod 'khor lo ma lus pa //
T02D2619:108b-23: mchod rgyas 'di nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yin //
T02D2619:108b-24: shi bar gyur kyang bla yi dad med par //
T02D2619:108b-25: mchod bral skad cig ma yin sdig thob 'gyur //
T02D2619:108b-27: / me tog thal mos gtor ba dang //
T02D2619:108b-28: gang de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams //
T02D2619:108b-29: de ni til gyi thal mo spyin //
T02D2619:108b-30: skye ba dang ni 'jig pa rnams //
T02D2619:108b-31: sna tshogs shes rab kyis nyams pas //
T02D2619:108b-32: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
T02D2619:108b-33: yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol //
T02D2619:108b-34: 'jig rten gsum gyi spyi bo yi //
T02D2619:108b-35: mi yi nor bu'i tshogs rnams ni //
T02D2619:108b-36: mtshungs med mi yi seng ge yis //
T02D2619:108b-37: bdud kyi glang po 'joms par byed //
T02D2619:108b-38: ma rig sdong po gcod pa yi //
T02D2619:108b-39: thub pa'i yon tan tshogs 'khor lo //
T02D2619:108b-40: phyag 'tshal bstod dang kha zas kyis //
T02D2619:108b-41: dge 'dun dag ni mchod par bya'o //
T02D2619:108b-42: bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni //
T02D2619:108b-43: shes rab ye shes mi bzad med //
T02D2619:108b-44: rtog pa shing gi rtsa ba dag / sreg pa'i
T02D2619:108b-45: rdo rje rdung bar shog / rdo rje'i rigs ni
T02D2619:108b-46: rtogs pa dang // rin chen rigs ni thob pa dang //
T02D2619:109a-2: / las kyi rigs kyi don chen byed //
T02D2619:109a-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa las /
T02D2619:109a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon so ma shr'i mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2619:109a-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po ma h'a dzny'a na dang /
